name.ja: <ruby>鉄獣の炎工<rt>トライブリゲード・スプリガンズ</rt></ruby> キット

text.en:
If you control a "Tri-Brigade" or "Springans" monster other than "Tri-Brigade Springans Kitt": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 of the following monsters from your GY in Defense Position, except "Tri-Brigade Springans Kitt".
● "Tri-Brigade" monster ● "Springans" monster ● "Fallen of Albaz" or monster that mentions it
You can only use each effect of "Tri-Brigade Springans Kitt" once per turn.
